Title: 00 - Coding using HTML5 Canvas API
Description: The canvas API is about 'painting' on the screen, state is managed using a context object.

Samples.Title: Javascript example
Samples.Description: You draw in HTML5 Canvas using a 'context' and a set of instructions

Samples.Title: Blazor extensions
Samples.Description: You need to add the Blazor extensions to your project to use the canvas API

Samples.Title: Blazor extensions
Samples.Description: You need to add the Blazor extensions to your project to use the canvas API
